product_name: Craft Performance Run Shorts - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Focus on your training without getting distracted by your gear. The lightweight Performance Run shorts from Craft feature soft yet strong fabric that delivers complete comfort during tough workouts. Lightweight, breathable polyester fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly; inner liner brief provides support and structure and also moves moisture away from skin. Elastic drawcord waist; zippered hip pocket; reflective details; 4 in. inseam. Closeout.
